title: Crankbrothers Mallet and Stamp in Limited Edition Dunes Colorway
content:
Inspired by the wind-swept sand dunes of dry and arid regions, the Crankbrothers Mallet and Stamp shoes received a desert tan washed upper with dune lines overlaid in a glossy print. These shoes are available in limited supply via your local shop or Crankbrothers direct.

The post Crankbrothers Mallet and Stamp in Limited Edition Dunes Colorway appeared first on The Radavist.
author: John Watson
